column4: Latest;Oddar Meanchey province: Preliminary report says Thai authorities freed four Cambodian prisoners and handed over to Cambodian authorities at the gate of Choam international on ​​the afternoon of February 4
column10: Oddar Meanchey  were arrested on Tuesday. November 25
column16: Kampong Speu province was arrested on August 11
column17: 2017. All three were caught illegally logging in Thai territory------55-year-old Pov Chan Chheal from Preah Vihear province is a disabled man who was arrested on December 16
column18: 2019 for smuggling four wild animals into Thailand.------Cambodian authorities said after being released from Thai prison
column19: the four were educated and signed a contract not to do any illegal border crossings again and were able to return to their families the same day. MCPN
